section.p: The Medications Section contains a patient's current medications and pertinent medication history. At a minimum, the currently active medications are listed. An entire medication history is an option. The section can describe a patient's prescription and dispense history and information about intended drug monitoring. This section requires either an entry indicating the subject is not known to be on any medications or entries summarizing the subject's medications.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-7568, CONF:1098-10433, CONF:1098-32499 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.1.1"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Medications Section Entries Optional2 template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.1:2014-06-09)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor="NI" (CONF:1098-32845)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-15387)/@code="10160-0" History of medication use (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-15388, CONF:1098-30825)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:1098-7570)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:1098-7571)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-7572, CONF:1098-10077)
If section/@nullFlavor is not present:
Conforms to Medication Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16:2014-06-09)
SHALL conform to Medications Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.1)
SHALL conform to Medications Section Entries Optional2 template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.1:2014-06-09)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor="NI" (CONF:1098-32845)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-15387)/@code="10160-0" History of medication use (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-15388, CONF:1098-30825)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:1098-7570)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:1098-7571)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-7795, CONF:1098-10076)
Conforms to Medication Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16:2014-06-09)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-7572, CONF:1098-10077)
Conforms to Medication Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16:2014-06-09)
If section/@nullFlavor is not present:
If medication use is unknown, the appropriate nullFlavor MAY be present (see unknown information in Section 1)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire

body.codeblock: <section xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" nullFlavor="NI"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.1.1" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.1"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.1" extension="2014-06-09"/> <code code="10160-0" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="History of medication use"/> <title>History of medication use</title> <text>JTWJVEhmE lEKBQDLac kCeonurI AuYRQ fMYlQ wRokvln aColurnK VNLFBc hCayKNc PcgaDQaW aZPaih bzxqW tEiBfzMUb gBuTHabe BPwZEGb QyWdf rUiVzalMZ WqqMMuL nZDPgdsvc flaXkwDnd XRtCSy HAAdtMMi cxQQZHNUb TIQDkE vGbijMJ Nyais IgKOjU TxUPm BwFXfamYy McXIzRi BsSslyVFn NIHtNVI FZBhh xNDyl KzpaOz jXyzQkGuj fMYCBD QooUtHCcP qllCxgfoL bxBBanIl jFTJUGdVD yiRIINc YjuWW FyPToZV mFZldgZiS gwbgO uncuBmXz PTrPW TrmrRzjHJ TqBTsojfF kFJyIVm YjoNWYN QfvbB JVWVkO rpvYAsorb EngCTpLw PjmArJ PmJBosn mLIMCq VripOE RAWguHp joxvb qYNWjpYjE SmbCnyDCA KgXKPTAm wuyruSH MukrnzUAQ AikgXmjA ctshzo rjdUgT cjySIY RQPhtOeFs iUpcox uirHLpNk rZBrKlz KqzfE EINodBK TIyvaFPN sAqGKumF PxQuFA AsxRbW HlKCL hTRvgGGLQ ptToQg wYHiKORuV </text> </section>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7568, CONF:10433 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.1.1"
Consol Medications Section If medication use is unknown, the appropriate nullFlavor MAY be present (see unknown information in Section 1)
SHALL conform to Medications Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.1)
Consol Medications Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="10160-0" History of medication use (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:7569)
Consol Medications Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:7570)
Consol Medications Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7571)

Consol Medications Section If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:7572, CONF:7573) Conforms to Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)
